welcome.title: Welcome to Inquiro
welcome.description: Let's personalize your experience in just a few steps
welcome.message: We're excited to have you here. Let's set up your account so you can start creating amazing surveys and gathering valuable insights.

profile.title: Complete Your Profile
profile.description: Tell us a bit about yourself
profile.hint: Your name will be displayed on surveys and reports

appearance.title: Customize Your Look
appearance.description: Choose your preferred theme and colors

accessibility.title: Accessibility Settings
accessibility.description: Customize for your comfort and needs
accessibility.intro: Customize your experience for better accessibility
accessibility.highContrastDesc: Increase color contrast for better visibility
accessibility.largeTextDesc: Increase font size throughout the app
accessibility.dyslexiaFontDesc: Use a font designed for easier reading
accessibility.hint: You can adjust these settings anytime in Settings → Accessibility

language.title: Select Your Language
language.description: Choose the language you're most comfortable with

notifications.title: Stay Informed
notifications.description: Choose how you want to be notified
notifications.responsesDesc: Get notified when someone responds to your survey
notifications.digestDesc: Receive a weekly summary of your survey performance
notifications.hint: You can change these settings anytime in your account preferences

complete.title: You're All Set!
complete.description: Your account is ready to go
complete.message: Your workspace is all set up. Start creating surveys, analyzing responses, and sharing insights with your team.

welcome.title: Your Survey Journey
welcome.description: Let's walk through the essential workflow together
welcome.message: This quick guide will walk you through the essential steps to create, distribute, and analyze your surveys.

workspace.title: Organize with Workspaces
workspace.description: Keep your surveys organized by team or project
workspace.intro: Workspaces help you organize surveys by team, project, or client. Think of them as folders for your work.

benefits.title: Workspace Benefits
benefits.organize: Organize surveys by project or team

workspace.hint: You can access workspaces from the sidebar or navigation menu.

createSurvey.title: Create Your First Survey
createSurvey.description: Choose how you want to start building
createSurvey.intro: Ready to create? You have two options to get started:

scratch.title: Start from Scratch
scratch.desc: Build a custom survey with full control

createSurvey.shortcut: Pro tip: Press Ctrl+N to quickly create a new survey

questions.title: Add Questions
questions.description: Build your survey with 10+ question types
questions.intro: The Survey Builder supports 10+ question types. Here are some popular ones:

themes.title: Style Your Survey
themes.description: Make it beautiful with custom themes
themes.intro: Make your surveys visually appealing with custom themes. Matching your brand has never been easier.
themes.hint: Access Themes from the sidebar to create reusable designs.

preview.title: Preview Before Sharing
preview.description: Test your survey like a respondent would
preview.intro: Always preview your survey before sharing! See exactly what respondents will experience.

features.title: Preview Features
features.test: Test the survey as a respondent

preview.hint: Click the Preview button in the Survey Builder toolbar.

distribute.title: Share Your Survey
distribute.description: Get your survey out to the world
distribute.intro: Once your survey is ready, publish it and share with your audience.
distribute.hint: Access Distribute from the sidebar to manage all your survey links.

responses.title: Track Responses
responses.intro: Watch responses come in real-time! Every submission is captured and stored securely.

analytics.title: Analyze Results
analytics.intro: Turn raw data into actionable insights with powerful analytics.

complete.title: You're Ready!
complete.description: You know the essentials - time to create
complete.message: You now know the essentials. Start creating surveys and gathering valuable insights!

trigger.title: Getting Started Guide
trigger.description: Walk through the survey creation workflow
